attributes.action: Ban running at the Olympics if it raining
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pancake races (which usually include running) have been banned in Okehampton, Devon, Ripon, North Yorkshire and recently in St Albans because of damp running conditions. Can you assure us the same Heath and Safety rules will apply at the 2012 Olympics by reducing races to a walk if the ground is damp thus allowing the world to see how sensible our politics are on protecting our citizens in this country

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
